DamageResistances: Acid, Bludgeoning, Slashing, and Piercing from non-magical weapons

Traits.Name: Moisture Absorption
Traits.Content: The Plumbing Blob can absorb moisture from its surroundings, allowing it to heal 5 hit points at the start of its turn if it is in a damp environment.

Traits.Name: Corrosive Surface
Traits.Content: Any nonmagical surface that the Plumbing Blob moves over becomes slick and difficult to traverse. Creatures that move over this surface must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.

Actions.Name: Slimy Slam
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reaching out with a pseudopod of ooze to strike. On a hit, it deals 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be grappled by the blob, becoming unable to move until it escapes.

Actions.Name: Corrosive Splash
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +5 to hit, expelling a splash of corrosive slime at a range of 30 feet. On a hit, it deals 10 (2d6 + 3) acid damage. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or have disadvantage on its next attack roll as the corrosive slime burns away at its weapon.

Actions.Name: Engulf
Actions.Content: The Plumbing Blob attempts to engulf a creature it is grappling. The target must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 15 (3d10) acid damage and is restrained. On a success, the creature takes half damage and escapes the grapple.
